definition: a process in which an agent causes an organic substance to break down into simpler substances, go sour or spoil
details:
noun
- a process in which an agent causes an organic substance to break down into simpler substances
= synonyms: zymosis
- a state of agitation or turbulent change or development
= example: a state of agitation or turbulent change or development
= synonyms: agitation
- a substance capable of bringing about fermentation
verb
- go sour or spoil
= synonyms: turn
- cause to undergo fermentation
= example: cause to undergo fermentation
= synonyms: work
- work up into agitation or excitement
= example: work up into agitation or excitement
- be in an agitated or excited state
= example: be in an agitated or excited state
